sndlib.core.util
Class SNDlibMessages

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.util.SNDlibMessages

public class SNDlibMessages
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a static interface for creating keyed messages used in SNDlib, e.g. the IO implementation. The message formats are stored in the file MessageResources.properties contained in this package.

It is used in the implementation of this API but should not be used directly by the users of the same.

Author:
Roman Klaehne
